zh_CN {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%c%N%T%N%s %h %e %r%N%b%N%d%N%f%N%a%N" }
    }
    CountryISBNNumber { "156" }
    CountryNumber { "156" }
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\uFFE5",
            "CNY ",
            ".",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Chinese locale for Peoples Republic of China" }
        Source { "" }
        Address { "" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Chinese" }
        Territory { "P.R. of China" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "0.1" }
        Date { "2000-07-25" }
    }
    LanguageLibraryUse { "chi" }
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[yY\u662F]" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN\u4E0D\u5426]" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%f%t%g%t%d" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "\u5148\u751F" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "\u5C0F\u59D0" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "\u592A\u592A" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "\u5973\u58EB" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4#,##0.00;\u00A4-#,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "00" }
        InternationalPrefix { "86" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            AmPmMarkers{
                    "\u4E0A\u5348",
                    "\u4E0B\u5348",
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "aa hh\u65F6mm\u5206ss\u79D2",
                    "HH\u65F6mm\u5206ss\u79D2",
                    "HH\u65F6mm\u5206ss\u79D2",
                    "HH\u65F6mm\u5206ss\u79D2",
                    "yyyy\u5E74MMMM\u6708dd\u65E5 EEEE ",
                    "yyyy\u5E74MMMM\u6708dd\u65E5 EEEE HH\u65F6mm\u5206ss\u79D2",
                    "yyyy\u5E74MMMM\u6708dd\u65E5",
                    "yyyy\u5E74MMMM\u6708dd\u65E5",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "\u65E5",
                            "\u4E00",
                            "\u4E8C",
                            "\u4E09",
                            "\u56DB",
                            "\u4E94",
                            "\u516D",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\u661F\u671F\u65E5",
                            "\u661F\u671F\u4E00",
                            "\u661F\u671F\u4E8C",
                            "\u661F\u671F\u4E09",
                            "\u661F\u671F\u56DB",
                            "\u661F\u671F\u4E94",
                            "\u661F\u671F\u516D",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            " 1\u6708",
                            " 2\u6708",
                            " 3\u6708",
                            " 4\u6708",
                            " 5\u6708",
                            " 6\u6708",
                            " 7\u6708",
                            " 8\u6708",
                            " 9\u6708",
                            "10\u6708",
                            "11\u6708",
                            "12\u6708",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\u4E00\u6708",
                            "\u4E8C\u6708",
                            "\u4E09\u6708",
                            "\u56DB\u6708",
                            "\u4E94\u6708",
                            "\u516D\u6708",
                            "\u4E03\u6708",
                            "\u516B\u6708",
                            "\u4E5D\u6708",
                            "\u5341\u6708",
                            "\u5341\u4E00\u6708",
                            "\u5341\u4E8C\u6708",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
